original: intros f g a b Hf Hg. intros eps. destruct (Hf (mkposreal eps (pos_eps eps))) as [phi [psi [H1 H2]]]. destruct (Hg (mkposreal eps (pos_eps eps))) as [phi' [psi' [H1' H2']]]. exists (fun x => phi x + phi' x). exists (fun x => psi x + psi' x). split; intros. - rewrite <- Rplus_assoc. apply Rplus_le_compat; [apply H1 | apply H1']. - simpl. rewrite Rabs_RiemannInt_SF. apply Rplus_lt_compat; [apply H2 | apply H2'].
